name: Direct Partners
tag_list: advertising, marketing, direct, interactive-services, print-production, media, research
overview:
Direct Partners is a results-oriented direct marketing firm that specializes in customer intelligence. Utilizing targeted, one-to-one communications, Direct Partners create sustainable marketing solutions for our clients. Our capabilities include Creative Development (on all media), Database/Analytics, Strategy and Interactive Development.

Our company was founded in 1994 on the belief that every marketing decision should be inspired and supported by verifiable information, and that its only goal should be to achieve a real business objective.

Our near obsession with data and analytics is driven by our desire to make the best possible use of our your financial and human resources. Thus, all of our Creative, Interactive, Media and Brand Development efforts are strictly tied to measurable ROI metrics, which are reported in real-time.

Whether you are looking for a customized marketing solution that spans every facet of your business, or just a well-targeted email or mail campaign to garner sales during those crucial times, we will work with you to establish specific goals to which every marketing dollar will be held accountable.

On limited budget, we have helped to grow businesses like PeoplePC, Xoom, and the PlayStation Store from $0 to over $50 million in just a few years. With this kind of performance, we tend to form long-lasting relationships with our clients. Our first client M&M/Mars, is still with us after 15 years.

Direct Partners is a full-service marketing agency with offices in Marina del Rey, CA and San Francisco, CA. Our clients, located in North America and Europe, use our programs to reach consumers in their native language in 58 countries worldwide.
